TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit JsonConverter`1<T> extends System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter
Public MustInherit Class JsonConverter(Of T) Inherits JsonConverter
generic <typename T> public ref class JsonConverter abstract : System::Text::Json::Serialization::JsonConverter

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 转换器处理的对象或值的类型。

span.span: The type of object or value handled by the converter.

summary.span: 将对象或值转换为 JSON，或是从 JSON 转换为对象或值。

span.span: Converts an object or value to or from JSON.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool CanConvert(class System.Type typeToConvert) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CanConvert (typeToConvert As Type) As Boolean

param.name: typeToConvert
param.span: 要针对其进行比较的类型。

summary.span: 确定是否可以转换指定类型。

span.span: Determines whether the specified type can be converted.

returns.span: 如果可以转换类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type can be converted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现是在 `typeToConvert` 等于 `typeof(T)`时返回 `true`。The default implementation is to return `true` when `typeToConvert` equals `typeof(T)`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).

span.span: Reads and converts the JSON to type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Write (System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter writer, T value, System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Write(class System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter writer, !T value, class System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions options) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Write (writer As Utf8JsonWriter, value As T, options As JsonSerializerOptions)
public: abstract void Write(System::Text::Json::Utf8JsonWriter ^ writer, T value, System::Text::Json::JsonSerializerOptions ^ options);
abstract member Write : System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter * 'T * System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions -> unit

param.name: value
param.span: 要转换为 JSON 的值。

span.span: The value to convert to JSON.

param.name: options
param.span: 一个对象，指定要使用的序列化选项。

span.span: An object that specifies serialization options to use.

summary.span: 将指定值作为 JSON 写入。

span.span: Writes a specified value as JSON.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器可能会引发任何异常，但它应在无法创建 JSON 引发。A converter may throw any exception, but it should throw when the JSON cannot be created. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何编写用于 JSON 序列化的自定义转换器](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern)。For more information, see [How to write custom converters for JSON serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/system-text-json-converters-how-to.md#steps-to-follow-the-basic-pattern).
